meanings.definition: Not performing or able to perform its intended function.
meanings.sent1: The broken toy was nonfunctional and could not play music.
meanings.sent2: The nonfunctional remote control needed new batteries to work.
meanings.sent3: The nonfunctional alarm clock decided to take a nap instead of waking me up.
meanings.sent4: Her nonfunctional phone was like a silent brick in her pocket.
meanings.sent5: The nonfunctional car engine sputtered and refused to start, leaving us stranded.

meanings.sent1: The nonfunctional computer screen displayed only a blank white light.
meanings.sent2: The old printer became nonfunctional after years of heavy use.
meanings.sent3: The nonfunctional vending machine kept spitting out empty wrappers instead of snacks.
meanings.sent4: His nonfunctional watch was a silent witness to the passing hours.
meanings.sent5: The nonfunctional streetlight flickered sporadically, casting eerie shadows on the road.

meanings.definition: Lacking the ability to function effectively.
meanings.sent1: The nonfunctional team struggled to score any points in the game.
meanings.sent2: The nonfunctional strategy failed to attract new customers to the store.
meanings.sent3: The nonfunctional umbrella turned inside out at the first gust of wind.
meanings.sent4: Her nonfunctional plan fell apart like a house of cards in a storm.
meanings.sent5: The nonfunctional vacuum cleaner coughed and wheezed but picked up no dirt.
